name: Redux Saga Routine Stages Flow Diagram
description: Visual representation of Redux Saga routine lifecycle showing how a single routine prefix generates multiple action stages (TRIGGER, REQUEST, SUCCESS, FAILURE, FULFILL) for streamlined async operation management.

name: Redux Routine Action Stages Flow Diagram
description: Flowchart showing how a single routine prefix generates multiple Redux action types including TRIGGER, REQUEST, SUCCESS, FAILURE, and FULFILL stages for managing asynchronous operations
